```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyclust)
library(finetune)
library(shinydashboard)
library(timetk)
```


```{r}
tornados <- data.table::fread('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-05-16/tornados.csv')

tornados %>% 
  glimpse()
```


```{r}
dat <- tornados %>% 
  select(-c(yr,mo,dy,date,time)) %>% 
  mutate(
    tonado_ID = om,
    time_zone = factor(tz),
    state = factor(st),
    state_fips = stf,
    total_injuries = inj,
    deaths = fat,
    
  )
```
